General.Name: Vtech Holdings Limited
General.Description: Vtech Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and distributes electronic products in Hong Kong, North America, Europe, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. The company offers electronic learning toys for infancy through toddler, and preschool under the Vtech and LeapFrog brands; platform products; and learning programs. It also provides telecommunication products, such as residential and commercial phones under the Vtech, snom, AT&T brands; and other telecommunication products, including baby monitors, handsets, and integrated access devices. In addition, the company offers contract manufacturing services for customers in the areas of professional audio equipment, hearables, Internet of Things, and medical and health products. Further, it provides property holding, and group financing and procurement services; develops broadband connectivity software; sells telecommunication and electronic products; and manufactures and sells plastic products. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Tai Po, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Tai Ping Industrial Centre, Tai Po, Hong Kong
